name: 9mm Ammo
description: A box of common 9mm bullets, suitable for most semi-automatic pistols.

name: Rifle Ammo
description: Higher caliber ammunition, designed for hunting or assault rifles. Powerful and accurate at long range.

name: Shotgun Shells
description: 12-gauge shells loaded with buckshot. Devastating at close range, but ineffective at distance.

name: Arrows
description: Wooden arrows with a makeshift metal tip. Silent and potentially recoverable.

name: Special Ammo
description: Advanced ammunition with unique properties, such as armor-piercing or incendiary rounds. Extremely rare and valuable.
